    BPTree

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      BPTreeInnerNode<T> BPTreeInnerNode.split​(PushUp<T> pushup)
      split the inner node and adjust values and pointers.
      Methods in BPTree with parameters of type BPTreeInnerNode 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      boolean BPTreeInnerNode.borrow​(BPTreeInnerNode<T> parent, int ptr)
      borrow from the right sibling or left sibling in case of overflow.
      boolean BPTreeLeafNode.borrow​(BPTreeInnerNode<T> parent, int ptr)
      tries to borrow a key from the left or right sibling
      boolean BPTreeInnerNode.delete​(T key, BPTreeInnerNode<T> parent, int ptr)
      delete key and return true or false if it is deleted or not
      boolean BPTreeLeafNode.delete​(T key, BPTreeInnerNode<T> parent, int ptr)
      delete the passed key from the B+ tree
      abstract boolean BPTreeNode.delete​(T key, BPTreeInnerNode<T> parent, int ptr)
      delete a key from the B+ tree recursively
      void BPTreeLeafNode.deleteRef​(T key, BPTreeInnerNode<T> parent, int ptr, Ref recordReference)
      delete a specific recordReference only that is in refPage associated with the passed key from the B+ tree
      PushUp<T> BPTreeInnerNode.insert​(T key, Ref recordReference, BPTreeInnerNode<T> parent, int ptr)
      insert given key in the corresponding index.
      PushUp<T> BPTreeLeafNode.insert​(T key, Ref recordReference, BPTreeInnerNode<T> parent, int ptr)
      insert the specified key associated with a given record refernce in the B+ tree
      abstract PushUp<T> BPTreeNode.insert​(T key, Ref recordReference, BPTreeInnerNode<T> parent, int ptr)
      insert a key with the associated record reference in the B+ tree
      void BPTreeInnerNode.merge​(BPTreeInnerNode<T> parent, int ptr)
      try to merge with left or right sibling in case of overflow
      void BPTreeInnerNode.merge​(java.lang.Comparable<T> parentKey, BPTreeInnerNode<T> foreignNode)
      merge the current node with the passed node and pulling the passed key from the parent to be inserted with the merged node
      void BPTreeLeafNode.merge​(BPTreeInnerNode<T> parent, int ptr)
      merges the current node with its left or right sibling
